attributes.action: Take the advice of the General Teaching Council to replace SATS tests with sample testing, on the grounds that preparing children to pass tests is not the same as giving them the knowledge that those tests are supposed to examine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure reliable teaching of the tested subjects would require surprise, random testing. Any teacher can confirm that the present system merely encourages preparation for tests rather than durable information input. The alternative proposed by the GTC is realistic and will maintain the transparency so desired by parents, according to Allan Johnston, MP.
